/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings line the sides of the street, adding to the urban atmosphere. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting two parts of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light on the scene below. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
